amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: COMPLIANCE WITH GREAT LAKES COMPACT SEC. __. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used by a State in contravention of the interstate compact regarding water resources in the Great Lakes--St. Lawrence River Basin consented to and approved by Congress in Public Law 110-342.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Higgins amendment (A087) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Higgins amendment (A087) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A087) offered by Mr. Higgins.
